title: Above the dust level [Widescreen]
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hygiene

Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Compulsive behavior
description: Set against a Sydney backdrop, a hypochondriac, her junkie ex-lover and a neighbour with a life threatening illness are united by dust, allergies and disappearing grey Y-fronts. Cast includes Jane Turner, Tobin Saunders and Melinda Dimitriades. (Awards: Winner of numerous awards, including Best Australian Short Comedy Award, MIFF 1999; Highly Commended, Melbourne Queer Film and Video Festival, 2000; Bronze Award, Houston Film Festival, 2000)
